title: Finland's prime minister Sanna Marin apologizes after going to nightclub despite covid-19 exposure
content:
1. Finland's prime minister Sanna Marin apologizes after going to nightclub despite covid-19 exposure  The Washington Post
  2. Sanna Marin: Finland's PM sorry for clubbing after Covid contact  BBC News
  3. Finnish PM apologises for staying out clubbing despite Covid exposure  The Guardian
  4. Finland PM Sanna Marin apologizes after being seen at nightclub following Covid exposure  NBC News
  5. Finland PM went out after adviser tested positive for COVID: reports  Business Insider
